Then, let's begin the match.\""},{"lineNumber":16242,"originalJapaneseLine":"二人は中庭にやってきた。","translatedEnglishLine":"The two of them came to the courtyard."},{"lineNumber":16243,"originalJapaneseLine":"「総統。私が勝った時の条件を","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Supreme Commander. May I set the conditions if I win?\""},{"lineNumber":16244,"originalJapaneseLine":"　付けていいだろうか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Would that be alright?\""},{"lineNumber":16245,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ？　ああ、いいぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? Ah, sure.\""},{"lineNumber":16246,"originalJapaneseLine":"「では……その魔剣カオスを頂く……のはどうか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then... how about granting me the magical sword Chaos...?"},{"lineNumber":16247,"originalJapaneseLine":"　必要な時に借りる、でもいい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Or allowing me to borrow it when necessary.\""},{"lineNumber":16248,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んん？　なんだそれは。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm? What is that?"},{"lineNumber":16249,"originalJapaneseLine":"　別に構わないが、このボケ魔剣は……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don't particularly mind, but as for this fool of a magical sword...\""},{"lineNumber":16250,"originalJapaneseLine":"「っ、おっととととと。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-wait, woah woah woah."},{"lineNumber":16251,"originalJapaneseLine":"　う、うーーん！　厳しい要求だが、俺も男だ！","translatedEnglishLine":"U-uhh! It's a tough demand, but I'm a man too!"},{"lineNumber":16252,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それを呑もう！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll accept it!\""},{"lineNumber":16253,"originalJapaneseLine":"（俺以外は使えない……ってのを明かすのは","translatedEnglishLine":"(Revealing that no one but me can use it..."},{"lineNumber":16254,"originalJapaneseLine":"　勝ってからだ。ぐふふ）","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll do that after I win. Hehe.)"},{"lineNumber":16255,"originalJapaneseLine":"（素質ない奴には","translatedEnglishLine":"(For those without the talent,"},{"lineNumber":16256,"originalJapaneseLine":"　カオスはやたら重くなるらしいからな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaos apparently becomes unbearably heavy."},{"lineNumber":16257,"originalJapaneseLine":"　動けなくなった所をぽこんと叩いて勝負アリだ）","translatedEnglishLine":"When they become immobile, a quick strike ends it.)"},{"lineNumber":16258,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ありがとう。では、始めるか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Thank you. Then, shall we begin?\""},{"lineNumber":16259,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おう。ほれ、カオスだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright. Here, Chaos.\""},{"lineNumber":16260,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あ、途中で捨てたら負けな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, and if you throw it away halfway, you lose.\""},{"lineNumber":16261,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よろしくしてね、姉ちゃん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nice to meet you, sis.\""},{"lineNumber":16262,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ……言っておくが」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah... but let me tell you this first.\""},{"lineNumber":16263,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んあ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":16264,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この勝負を持ちかけたのは貴方だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You are the one who challenged me to this match."},{"lineNumber":16265,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私はその範囲で望みを叶える」","translatedEnglishLine":"I will grant your wish within those terms.\""},{"lineNumber":16266,"originalJapaneseLine":"言って、セシルは背中の剣を鞘ごと渡す。","translatedEnglishLine":"Saying that, Cecil handed over the sword on her back, sheath and all."},{"lineNumber":16267,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がはははは、構わんぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahaha, I don't mind."},{"lineNumber":16268,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さあ、やるか」","translatedEnglishLine":"Now, let's do this.\""},{"lineNumber":16269,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ……では、っ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah... then, um...\""},{"lineNumber":16270,"originalJapaneseLine":"セシルがカオスを抜く。","translatedEnglishLine":"Cecil drew the Chaos sword."},{"lineNumber":16271,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぴきーん！　今だカオス！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Crack! Now, Chaos!\""},{"lineNumber":16272,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いよっしゃーーー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alrighty!\""},{"lineNumber":16273,"originalJapaneseLine":"　重力3000倍ーーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Gravity 3000 times——!\""},{"lineNumber":16274,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh!?\""},{"lineNumber":16275,"originalJapaneseLine":"セシルの身体が揺らぐ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Cecil's body trembled."},{"lineNumber":16276,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、重い……だと、っ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"H-Heavy... what...!\""},{"lineNumber":16277,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほほほほほほ。悪く思わないでねぇん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hohohohoho. Don't take it the wrong way."},{"lineNumber":16278,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さー、儂とめくるめく官能の園へー」","translatedEnglishLine":"Now, come with me to a dizzying garden of sensuality—\""},{"lineNumber":16279,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これが、魔剣か、っ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So this is a magical sword...!\""},{"lineNumber":16280,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははははは！　そういうことだ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahaha! That's exactly it!"},{"lineNumber":16281,"originalJapaneseLine":"　言ってなかったがそいつは俺しか振れん！","translatedEnglishLine":"I didn't say it before, but only I can wield that sword!"},{"lineNumber":16282,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さあ、かるーくぽこんと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Now, a light little tap...\""},{"lineNumber":16283,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスがセシルの剣を抜いた、その瞬間。","translatedEnglishLine":"The moment Rance drew Cecil's sword."},{"lineNumber":16284,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐ、ぐおおおおおおおおっ！！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"G-guooooooooh!!?\""},{"lineNumber":16285,"originalJapaneseLine":"そのとんでもない重量に、ランスの膝が折れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Under that incredible weight, Rance's knees buckled."},{"lineNumber":16286,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なななななな、なんじゃこりゃっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wha-what is this...!?\""},{"lineNumber":16287,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あれれれーーーん！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, ah, arerereeen!?\""},{"lineNumber":16288,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうした心の友！」","translatedEnglishLine":"What’s wrong, my friend?"},{"lineNumber":16289,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こ、こここ、この、剣……重い、ッ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Th-this, this, this sword... it's heavy...!\""},{"lineNumber":16290,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……グラビティソード。折れず曲がらずの剣だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Gravity Sword. It's a sword that neither breaks nor bends.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人は中庭にやってきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The two of them came to the courtyard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「総統。私が勝った時の条件を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Supreme Commander. May I set the conditions if I win?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「では……その魔剣カオスを頂く……のはどうか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then... how about granting me the magical sword Chaos...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必要な時に借りる、でもいい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Or allowing me to borrow it when necessary."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別に構わないが、このボケ魔剣は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't particularly mind, but as for this fool of a magical sword..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: う、うーーん！　厳しい要求だが、俺も男だ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: U-uhh! It's a tough demand, but I'm a man too!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （俺以外は使えない……ってのを明かすのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Revealing that no one but me can use it...
I'll do that after I win. Hehe.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスはやたら重くなるらしいからな。
動けなくなった所をぽこんと叩いて勝負アリだ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When they become immobile, a quick strike ends it.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あ、途中で捨てたら負けな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, and if you throw it away halfway, you lose."
"Yeah... but let me tell you this first."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この勝負を持ちかけたのは貴方だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You are the one who challenged me to this match.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私はその範囲で望みを叶える」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will grant your wish within those terms."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言って、セシルは背中の剣を鞘ごと渡す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saying that, Cecil handed over the sword on her back, sheath and all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルがカオスを抜く。
セシルの身体が揺らぐ。
「ほほほほほほ。悪く思わないでねぇん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hohohohoho. Don't take it the wrong way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さー、儂とめくるめく官能の園へー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, come with me to a dizzying garden of sensuality—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははははは！　そういうことだ！
言ってなかったがそいつは俺しか振れん！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I didn't say it before, but only I can wield that sword!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さあ、かるーくぽこんと……」
ランスがセシルの剣を抜いた、その瞬間。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The moment Rance drew Cecil's sword.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのとんでもない重量に、ランスの膝が折れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Under that incredible weight, Rance's knees buckled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なななななな、なんじゃこりゃっ……！」
「……グラビティソード。折れず曲がらずの剣だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Gravity Sword. It's a sword that neither breaks nor bends."

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人は中庭にやってきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The two of them came to the courtyard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「総統。私が勝った時の条件を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Supreme Commander. May I set the conditions if I win?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「では……その魔剣カオスを頂く……のはどうか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then... how about granting me the magical sword Chaos...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必要な時に借りる、でもいい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Or allowing me to borrow it when necessary."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別に構わないが、このボケ魔剣は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't particularly mind, but as for this fool of a magical sword..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: う、うーーん！　厳しい要求だが、俺も男だ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: U-uhh! It's a tough demand, but I'm a man too!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （俺以外は使えない……ってのを明かすのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Revealing that no one but me can use it...
I'll do that after I win. Hehe.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスはやたら重くなるらしいからな。
動けなくなった所をぽこんと叩いて勝負アリだ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When they become immobile, a quick strike ends it.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あ、途中で捨てたら負けな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, and if you throw it away halfway, you lose."
"Yeah... but let me tell you this first."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この勝負を持ちかけたのは貴方だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You are the one who challenged me to this match.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私はその範囲で望みを叶える」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will grant your wish within those terms."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言って、セシルは背中の剣を鞘ごと渡す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saying that, Cecil handed over the sword on her back, sheath and all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルがカオスを抜く。
セシルの身体が揺らぐ。
「ほほほほほほ。悪く思わないでねぇん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hohohohoho. Don't take it the wrong way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さー、儂とめくるめく官能の園へー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, come with me to a dizzying garden of sensuality—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははははは！　そういうことだ！
言ってなかったがそいつは俺しか振れん！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I didn't say it before, but only I can wield that sword!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さあ、かるーくぽこんと……」
ランスがセシルの剣を抜いた、その瞬間。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The moment Rance drew Cecil's sword.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのとんでもない重量に、ランスの膝が折れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Under that incredible weight, Rance's knees buckled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なななななな、なんじゃこりゃっ……！」
「……グラビティソード。折れず曲がらずの剣だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Gravity Sword. It's a sword that neither breaks nor bends."
